name: Update emails from a Google Sheet with email status using DeBounce
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the emails by DeBounce and update the Google Sheet with the status of the emails. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jgAFWdLh9g0VkcgHU221T2NQOObOjGDEle6g8LwSeso/edit?usp=sharing).
